question: {name} goes to the store to buy some {item}. The normal brand of {item} he buys costs {cur}{price} per {unit}. He had to buy a more expensive brand that costs {percent}% more since his favorite brand was sold out. He decides to buy a week's worth of {item} and he uses {usage} {unit}s of {item} per day. He also decided to buy himself a {extra_item} for {cur}{extra_price}. Since he shopped more than {cur}50, he received a {cur}{discount} discount. How much does {name} have to pay?
